name: surestart-website
description: MySureStart website - Empowering the next generation of AI leaders

scripts.build: node scripts/build.js && npm run seo:sitemap && npm run seo:robots && npm run seo:redirects:build
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/build.js && npm run seo:sitemap && npm run seo:robots && npm run seo:redirects:build
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve dist -l 3000

author: MySureStart
